thread.title: Fire erupts again in ship at Gadani ship-breaking yard
thread.title_full: Fire erupts again in ship at Gadani ship-breaking yard

title: Fire erupts again in ship at Gadani ship-breaking yard
text:
Fire erupts again in ship at Gadani ship-breaking yard | Workers at Gadani ship-breaking yard were demanding workplace safety just two days ago 
A ship at Gadani ship-breaking yard on Monday caught fire for the second time in less than a month, Geo News reported. 
According to some reports, more than 100 workers were present on the ship when fire broke out. 70 workers have been rescued through life rafting boats. 
No casualty has been reported yet. 
The same ship had caught fire some weeks ago as well. However, the fire had been extinguished without any loss of life reported. 0 0 Fire erupts again in ship at Gadani ship-breaking yard was posted in pakistan of Geo TV - https://www.geo.tv on January 09, 2017 and was last updated on January 09, 2017. This news story is related to Gadani, Geo News, Geo Tv, Latest News Pakistan, Pakistan, Pakistan News, Ship Fire.
